#Text= Hiroshi Sato says : " Asami , what do you think you 're doing ?

column1: #Text=You are aiding the very people who took your mother away !
#Text=" Asami says : " You do n't feel love for Mom anymore .
#Text=You 're too full of hatred .
#Text=" Hiroshi Sato says : " You ungrateful , insolent child !
#Text=" Hiroshi Sato says : " I now see there is no chance to save you !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Mr. Sato , you are a horrible father !
#Text=" Asami says : " You really are a horrible father .
#Text=" Amon says : " Finally , you are powerless .
#Text=" Lieutenant says : " Amon !
#Text=Everything the Avatar said is true , is n't it ?
#Text=I just saw you bloodbend her .
#Text=You traitor !
#Text=I dedicated my life to you !
#Text=" Amon says : " You 've served me well , Lieutenant .
#Text=" Korra says : " Mako ... my bending .
#Text=" Mako says : " Everything will be all right !
#Text=We just need to get out of here .
#Text=" Amon says : " I 'm impressed .
#Text=No one has ever gotten the better of me like that .
#Text=It is almost a shame to take the bending of someone so talented .
#Text=Almost .
#Text=" Korra says : " No !
#Text=" Amon says : " Impossible !
#Text=" Korra says : " I - I can airbend ?
#Text=I can airbend !
#Text=" Korra says : " No ... you ... do n't !
#Text=" Crowd member # 1 says : " Did you see what happened ?
#Text=" Crowd member # 2 says : " You bending tyrant !
#Text=" Protester says : " Evil Avatar !
#Text=" Crowd member # 3 says : " He 's waterbending .
#Text=" Feathered hat man says : " He is a bender .
#Text=" Protester says : " Whoa !
#Text=" Crowd member # 4 says : " The scar is fake .
#Text=" Crowd member # 5 says : " The Avatar was telling the truth .
#Text="
